Articles.Content: I decided to make a 2D version with a team of some people on Scratch, and here's the "studio" that holds all of the stuff for it. (No copyright infringement intended. Original concepts belong to Private Division and Squad Games.) https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/27870656/projects/
